He couldn't believe no one had responded. He waved his fingers over 
the Maximal icon he kept from his protoform and it changed to 
Predicon. He sent another message:

My name is Shadow Star. I am likely the only hope you have of winning 
whatever war might be raging on this poor excuse for a plnet.

He could tell the evil was comming from a few bots. He hoped that 
meant they were a small faction who would rip their own sparks out 
and lay them at the feet of the Inferno for more power.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> He transformed into bot mode and approached the base(I'm guessing 
> blackfortress is the one in Europe).
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., dewboy30816@y... wrote:
> > He arrived and flew down. He could feel evil in the air. He knew 
> > inside he would find bots ready to give their sparks to the 
Inferno 
> > in a cycle. He sent out a message:
> > 
> > My name is Shadow Star. I wish to join you.
> >

> > > Megacycles he would arrive, and find sparks ready for the 
taking.
